/Applications/CLion.app/Contents/bin/cmake/bin/cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug -G "CodeBlocks - Unix Makefiles" /Users/jcoulter/libbitcoin
CMake Warning at CMakeLists.txt:486 (find_package):
  By not providing "Findlibbitcoin.cmake" in CMAKE_MODULE_PATH this project
  has asked CMake to find a package configuration file provided by
  "libbitcoin", but CMake did not find one.

  Could not find a package configuration file provided by "libbitcoin" with
  any of the following names:

    libbitcoinConfig.cmake
    libbitcoin-config.cmake

  Add the installation prefix of "libbitcoin" to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or set
  "libbitcoin_DIR" to a directory containing one of the above files.  If
  "libbitcoin" provides a separate development package or SDK, be sure it has
  been installed.


CMake Warning at CMakeLists.txt:487 (find_package):
  By not providing "Findlibbitcoin-client.cmake" in CMAKE_MODULE_PATH this
  project has asked CMake to find a package configuration file provided by
  "libbitcoin-client", but CMake did not find one.

  Could not find a package configuration file provided by "libbitcoin-client"
  with any of the following names:

    libbitcoin-clientConfig.cmake
    libbitcoin-client-config.cmake

  Add the installation prefix of "libbitcoin-client" to CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH or
  set "libbitcoin-client_DIR" to a directory containing one of the above
  files.  If "libbitcoin-client" provides a separate development package or
  SDK, be sure it has been installed.
